data.title: Worst hotel ive ever been too
data.text: Cockroaches, rooms smell aweful, burnholes in bedding, other bugs besides the cockroaches, nothing had been wiped down or cleaned in months probably. Sign clearly says you can be refunded money if you ask within ten minutes...no refund. Owners are A-HOLES. Not nice at all. Room was 15$ more than advertised. Place is a real dump. Called the environmental health department andneverything. Should have called the police for my money back too, but they got away with this one. Speechless

data.title: "Nice Inn" not nice at all
data.text:
Beware: Nice Inn Motel is the new name of this dump.  Window sign advertises "$49.99".  When I asked if I could see a room, I was told, "No, we don't show our rooms."  I asked if it was non-smoking and said that I wanted to be sure it didn't smell of tobacco.  He said, "This is a motel.  We don't show our rooms.  That's not my job."  ...and on and on.  It was obvious he wanted me to leave, so I did.  (I have never before had staff refuse to let me or my wife look at a room before moving in.)

[Bonanza Inn is just 2-3 blocks away and a wonderful experience for just $20 more.]

data.title: Double Charge Beware
data.text:
I am writing this review hoping to help someone esle not go through the same experiance as we did. 
I booked this hotel online and paid with credit card the day of booking which was 4 day's prior to my arrival.
 Upon arriving at  hotel  I was told that I needed to give them the credit card # again. I called my mom and got the # because she was the one who had the card, I gave it the the front desk clerk and we were given a key. We went to our room for a bit then left to our all day concert (ozzfest) we returned to our room at approx 11:30 pm to find we could not get into our room after trying a few times we went into the office to find out why. The front desk clerk told me the credit card had been declined, I did not understand this and why They would need to charge the card again so agian I call my mom to find out That infact the card was charged 4 day's prior to my arrival at the hotel. I was told I could pay to pay cash, and get my refund from online through the company I used. I told him I would pay  but would need a reciept as proof that I had to pay again, when I told him that he said "oh" the card went through. 
After all that we went to our room and later on found out there where roaches in the room. We encounter 3 other couples who had the same problems as I did. Never the less  after all the frusteration I did not go back to the desk clerk I just killed the roaches and left on the floor for them. 
This was a total waste of time and money spent at this hotel and believe It I will never stay at this place again.I was also disapointed to find out that hotel was  not 2 miles from my concert (when I mapped it)  but infact 30 miles from my concert .

The Mendoza's
